subject: RE: [junit] C++ Unit Tests
msgSnippet: I tried it for a while and it seamed flaky. It would create a bunch of automatic tests, but I always ended up deleting them and writing my own.  If I wasn t
messageBody:
I tried it for a while and it seamed flaky.

It would create a bunch of automatic tests, but I always ended up deleting
them and writing my own. If I wasn't careful, it would crash and I would
lose all my tests. I think it has potential, but it needs some work or
something (this is of course my opinion)

-----Original Message-----
From: msonnet@... [mailto:msonnet@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 17, 2001 9:41 AM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] C++ Unit Tests


Can anybody give some feedback on C++ Test from Parasoft ?


Thanks

Marc
